comments.raw_text:
Phone: Samsung Galaxy S II
Model Number: GT-I9100
Android Version: 2.3.3
FFx Version: See bottom of this bug


When responding to emails via Zimbra, you are unable to edit/input text into the body of the email.  The on-screen keyboard does not activate when clicking on the body.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Click "reply" from a message in Zimbra
2) Attempt to type in the body of the message
3) Can't type here, on-screen keyboard doesn't activate

Expected Result:
4) You should be able to respond to emails correctly.

Note: Composing new messages works just fine.  It's only responding to emails that has this bug.
